title: Man Climbing
description:
A male rock climber, shown climbing up a rock formation. Some platforms show the climber with a helmet, and/or rope.

Variations exist for üßó‍‚ôÄÔ∏è Woman Climbing and üßó Person Climbing.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's man climbing emoji portrays a figure in dynamic motion, with a focus on athletic form and determined posture, rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges. Realistic lighting highlights the contours of the body, suggesting effort and progress as the figure ascends. This emoji is often used to represent overcoming challenges, achieving goals, or engaging in sports and outdoor activities, embodying a spirit of perseverance and achievement as seen in Apple's user-centric design.
